DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, gain #b1 stacks of Sword Intent. NL Sword Intent: When playing a Sword Technique Card, if the number of Sword Intent stacks is greater than 0, consume all Sword Intent stacks. For each stack consumed, play that Sword Technique Card repeatedly once.
